description: A React component for managing scheduling tabs within a surgical schedule management system. Includes subcomponents for managing availability and scheduling ICU, with forms and UI elements for resource selection, date/time configuration, and recurrence settings.

methods.name: ScheduleTabs
methods.description: Main component providing tabbed UI for managing availability and scheduling ICU.

methods.name: ManageAvailability
methods.description: Subcomponent rendering a form to set resource availability, including resource selection, date/time, and recurrence options.

methods.name: saveAvailability
methods.description: Handles form submission to save resource availability data.
